title: Interview with Dr. Aliya Hamid Rao
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr. Aliya Hamid Rao who is an assistant Professor of Sociology at Singapore management university. Aliya talks about her new book 'Crunch time; how married couples confront unemployment' and how the treatment of unemployment differs compared to whether it is the male or female has that faces the predicament.
